Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-28182 affecting package fluent-bit for versions less than 3.1.9-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-28182 affecting package fluent-bit for versions less than 3.1.9-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package fluent-bit is earlier than 3.1.9-2, affected by CVE-2024-28182
